project_descr: The project intends to improve governance at different levels, track and monitor the implementation of vision 2025 towards the targeted results and improved inter-provincial/inter-departmental coordination.

outputs.output_descr: This initiative provides support to the Ministry of Planning, Development and Reform for public sector reforms and innovation for improved performance and service delivery, citizen’s satisfaction and reducing multi-dimensional poverty
